text: Geoffrey Bruce Owen "Geoff" Edwards (February 15, 1931 - March 5, 2014) was an American television actor, game show host, radio personality, writer, and broadcaster. He appeared in I Dream of Jeannie, That Girl, Petticoat Junction, Diff'rent Strokes, and Small Wonder. He was born in Westfield, New Jersey. Edwards died from complications of pneumonia at Saint John's Health Center on March 5, 2014 in Santa Monica, California. He was 83 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Geoff Edwards' travel website * Geoff Edwards' blog * Category:1931 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:American game show hosts Category:American radio personalities Category:American television actors Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Infectious disease deaths in Los Angeles County, California Category:Television personalities from New Jersey Category:Writers from New Jersey
title: Geoff Edwards
